text_block_list.text:
Listen. Just because those guys are crazy awesome— 
doesn't mean you're any less yourself, Ardan.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Ace-san…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Course, if it were Ramonu, she might've gone through it like a hot knife through butter. She'd be inside right about now, a teacake in her hands, lookin' all serene.
But listen up, Ardan! The one here right now— the one who's been goin' against the grain all this time is you!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
I've been watchin' ya. You make the time, 
and you put your whole back and more into it.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: You said it, didn't ya? That with all your might, you'd catch up and snap at Maruzen, even Rudolf!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: So don't doubt yourself. Don't just assume you can't. Give yourself a good look. Not at anybody else, but you yourself!
… Ah—
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (… This feeling so reminiscent of frustration. Whenever I compare my worthless self to my perfect sister, it's always—)

—Mejiro Ramonu is in top shape. She's as beautiful as ever. 
—Indeed. When she dances, she shines just like a precious gemstone…
text_block_list.name: Audience

text_block_list.text:
—The girl from earlier was feeling unwell so she'd had to step in suddenly, but… 
—You wouldn't think that at all, would you? Look: She's utterly magnificent!
text_block_list.name: Audience

text_block_list.text: (I remember. I was dragging myself around, still heavy after barely recovering from a fever, watching it from the wings… the blurry shine of the spotlight.)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Nee-sama… is so incredible. Such an elegant, beautiful dance… she had the entire audience lighting up…
text_block_list.name: Young Ardan
Young Ardan
text_block_list.text: I'm sure… for someone like me, doing that is—
(Plink. Plink. Plink.)
She's really… so incredible…
text_block_list.name: Young Ardan

text_block_list.text: No matter how hard… I try… I'll never… be able to be like her…!
text_block_list.name: Young Ardan

text_block_list.text: Because nee-sama is incredible… and… I'm… not…!
text_block_list.name: Young Ardan
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (Of course, I was simply inferior to my sister's raw talent. But… hey, little me. — "What if it were me on that stage?")

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (What would I have shown them? What kind of brilliance? To know, I have to dance. I have to stand on stage with my own two feet!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (And as for my self-worth: for as long as I myself haven't proven it on a stage I belong on— it isn't decided!)
(Even if it seems like my sister is the shining star of the show! That alone won't be a reason to mar my self-worth—!)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: … Thank you very much, Ace-san. And— allow me to apologise.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Oh?… What'cha apologisin' for?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I had you come out all this way, but… I'll be heading back inside tonight.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: I'm different from all of you… and from my sister, as well. The reason being that my body is on the frailer end.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro ARdan
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: —I'd like to take a moment and recharge. For the sake of shining with everyone else from tomorrow onwards again.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Hehe… you got it! I think that's the way to go, too. 
'Aight, we should head back—

Oh, if it isn't Ardan and Ace! 
What're you up to inna… place like— achoo!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: C—C.B.-san?! Were you outside wearing only that?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Mmm～ see, I was feeling super flushed after getting out of the bath… and for a bit the snow lit up by the night lights was really pretty. So… achoo!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Geez, you're a lost cause…! Oi, C.B., Ardan!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Come with me! We're jumpin' back in the hot spring!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I saw Ace and the others heading towards the bath just earlier. Mejiro Ardan was in accompaniment… she seemed to be enjoying herself.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: It appears that this hot spring trip has indeed bore fruit… With this, your objectives are achieved, are they not, Maruzensky?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Oh? Did I ever say that nudging along 
Ardan-chan was my only objective?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Hm?… What do you mean?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Fufu～. Onee-san's got eagle eyes, y'know? Rudolf.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Taaaaaaah-! 
Oryaaaagh!
text_block_list.name: C.B. & Ace

text_block_list.text: I wonder what kind of look you had on your face when you were watching those two… hm?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Hey, Rudolf. Are you gonna be satisfied with the performance as it is now? Really?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Katsuragi Ace and Mr. C.B. might just 
leave you in the dust, you know?

Ardan-chan's all right on her own now, you know? 
No matter what lies ahead— she'll catch up.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Even if you were to, say, shine even 
more brightly, more dazzlingly.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: …What a predicament.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: With Ramonu's absence, it seems I've completely underestimated the need to keep my guard up in regards to jabs.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Ahaha! I might not be at her level, but I've got a taste for it too, y'know? The way you squirm about when poked.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But if we backtrack a little, it's you who started it, you know? You said it: "This time, I'll bathe all Umamusume in the brilliance of the Northern Lights," didn'tcha?
I got all excited too. So I'm not letting you off the hook, m'kay? Until you give me an answer, you're not going to bed.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
Hey, are you really okay with things going on this way? 
—Ms. "Emperor".
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
